snippet: Iceland’s prime minister has said a council of ministers would explore how the island nation could take in migrants.
abstract: Thousands of residents in Iceland use Facebook to pressure government to accept more migrants, with some offering money, housing and help with assimilation.
lead_paragraph: Iceland’s prime minister has said a council of ministers would explore how the island nation could take in migrants.

headline.main: Icelanders Use Facebook to Open Door to Refugees
headline.print_headline: Icelanders Use Facebook to Open Door to Refugees

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
